name: Echo Disco
description:
In this game, you have to make your way through dancefloors by performing the right dance moves in the correct order.
To do so, you control a small robot that shoots a soundwave (Echo) that can bounce on mirrors you place and walls. You have to shoot through the right dance moves with the Echo to finish the level.

A game made in 48h during a Game Jam with the theme : "Echo"

The Team:

Game Dev Ethace (Cédric Mevel)

Level Designer & 3D Artist Oldis (Mario Dujardin)

Sound Designer & Composer Nuttyfree (Aymeric Marty) Twitter : https://twitter.com/Nuttyfree22

2D Artist Setsuretsu (Guilhem de Maisonneuve) Twitter : https://twitter.com/Setsuretsu
